name: Hit Tiles 2: Special Edition
overview: HIT TILES 2 SPECIAL EDITION is a game based on the well-known oriental game called Shanghai. It consists of 15 levels, each one featuring a screen made up of 120 tiles placed in piles up to 4 high. In every screen there are 4 of each tile. The aim of the game is to remove all of the tiles from the screen. The main and only rule you have to keep in mind is this: You can only remove 2 matching\linked tiles at a time ad both must have an empty place on either the left or the right hand side. Game includes IFF to Tile program to make new tile sets. Full version V1.1 Released on Aminet in game/think. More tile sets on aminet. Tile sets from old versions of Hit Tiles also work.
